movieInfo.name: Batman Begins
movieInfo.description: After Gordon, Dent and Batman begin an assault on Gotham's organised crime, the mobs hire the Joker, a psychopathic criminal mastermind who offers to kill Batman and bring the city to its knees.

updates.name: Batman Begins
updates.description: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.
Tales of swords and sorcery, fire and ice, and dungeons andâ€¦you get the idea.
